org.apache.streams.twitter.api

Interface Friendships


  • @Remoteable(path="https://api.twitter.com/1.1/friendships")
public interface Friendships
    Interface for /friendships methods.
    See Also:
    https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User create(FriendshipCreateRequest parameters)
      Allows the authenticating users to follow the user specified in the ID parameter.
      User destroy(FriendshipDestroyRequest parameters)
      Allows the authenticating user to unfollow the user specified in the ID parameter.
      List<Friendship> lookup(FriendshipsLookupRequest parameters)
      Returns the relationships of the authenticating user to the comma-separated list of up to 100 screen_names or user_ids provided.
      FriendshipShowResponse outgoing(FriendshipShowRequest parameters)
      Returns detailed information about the relationship between two arbitrary users.
      User outgoing(FriendshipsOutgoingRequest parameters)
      Returns a collection of numeric IDs for every protected user for whom the authenticating user has a pending follow request.
      User update(FriendshipUpdateRequest parameters)
      Allows one to enable or disable retweets and device notifications from the specified user.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="POST",
              path="/create.json")
User create(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                FriendshipCreateRequest parameters)
        Allows the authenticating users to follow the user specified in the ID parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameters - FollowersIdsRequest
        Returns:
        FollowersIdsResponse
        See Also:
        https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference/post/friendships/create

      • destroy

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="POST",
              path="/destroy.json")
User destroy(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                  FriendshipDestroyRequest parameters)
        Allows the authenticating user to unfollow the user specified in the ID parameter.
        Parameters:
        parameters - User
        Returns:
        User
        See Also:
        https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference/post/friendships/destroy

      • lookup

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/lookup.json")
List<Friendship> lookup(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                           FriendshipsLookupRequest parameters)
        Returns the relationships of the authenticating user to the comma-separated list of up to 100 screen_names or user_ids provided. Values for connections can be: following, following_requested, followed_by, none, blocking, muting.
        Parameters:
        parameters - FriendshipsLookupRequest
        Returns:
        List
        See Also:
        https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference/get/friendships/lookup

      • outgoing

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/outgoing.json")
User outgoing(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                   FriendshipsOutgoingRequest parameters)
        Returns a collection of numeric IDs for every protected user for whom the authenticating user has a pending follow request.
        Parameters:
        parameters - FriendshipsOutgoingRequest
        Returns:
        FollowersListResponse
        See Also:
        https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference/get/friendships/outgoing

      • outgoing

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/show.json")
FriendshipShowResponse outgoing(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                                                 FriendshipShowRequest parameters)
        Returns detailed information about the relationship between two arbitrary users.
        Parameters:
        parameters - FriendshipShowRequest
        Returns:
        FriendshipShowResponse
        See Also:
        https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference/get/friendships/show

      • update

        @RemoteMethod(httpMethod="GET",
              path="/update.json")
User update(@QueryIfNE(value="*")
                                                                               FriendshipUpdateRequest parameters)
        Allows one to enable or disable retweets and device notifications from the specified user.
        Parameters:
        parameters - FriendshipUpdateRequest
        Returns:
        User
        See Also:
        https://dev.twitter.com/rest/reference/post/friendships/update
